AFS Freight Billing & Logistics Management System

Enterprise-scale freight billing and logistics management platform built on MultiValue database technology

Project Overview

Name:
AFS Freight Billing and Logistics Management System
Key:
afs_verify
Description:
Comprehensive freight billing and logistics management system handling end-to-end freight operations including rate calculation, bill processing, carrier integration, and financial reconciliation across multiple transportation modes.
Platform:
MultiValue Database System
Interface:
Terminal-based (AccuTerm), Web Integration
Size:
1,779,447 lines of code across 2,333 files
File Types:
MultiValue .EDI .XML .SQL .PDF .INVOICE .FREIGHT .RATE .BILLS

System Capabilities

Operation:
24/7 freight billing and logistics operations
Transportation Modes:
LTL (Less-Than-Truckload)
Comprehensive LTL freight billing with carrier rate optimization
Truckload Operations
Full truckload management and dedicated capacity billing
Air Freight
Air cargo billing with express and standard service options
International Shipping
Cross-border freight with customs and currency handling
Processing Volume:
1000+ EDI/day 25+ External Systems Multi-carrier Rating Real-time Processing

Architecture

Style:
Monolithic Multi-tier Architecture
Architectural Layers:
Application Layer (1,176 files)
Core business logic, reporting, and maintenance functions
Integration Layer (918 files)
External services, file processing, and data exchange
Data Layer (874 files)
Data validation, retrieval, maintenance, and migration
Presentation Layer (104 files)
Terminal interface, reporting, and user interaction
Cross-Cutting Concerns (42 files)
Security, auditing, performance monitoring, and diagnostics
Test (56 files)
Integration testing, performance testing, and validation
Key Patterns:
Modular Programming Batch Processing Real-time Integration Event-driven Processing Role-based Access

Business Functions

Freight Bill Management
Complete freight billing lifecycle from entry to payment
Bill Entry Bill Processing Bill Auditing Invoice Generation

Customer and carrier relationship management
Client Master Data Carrier Integration Terminal Details Transit Times

ERP integration and financial reconciliation

EDI processing and external system connectivity

External Integrations

Rate Services:
PC Miler RateWareXL TEMPO SMC3 OLA
Key Integrations:

Transit time calculations and carrier terminal data

Package tracking and delivery status updates

Technical Platform

Database:
MultiValue Database with SQL Integration
Interface:
Terminal Interface AccuTerm Web Integration Screen Output
Core Technologies:
MultiValue Database Platform
Primary data storage and business logic execution platform
EDI Processing Engine
X12 and EDIFACT transaction processing capabilities
Batch Processing Framework
Automated file processing and data synchronization
REST/SOAP Integration
Web service connectivity for external system integration
Custom Report Generation
Flexible reporting engine with multiple output formats

Directory Structure

freight_billing/
Core freight billing and invoice processing
  • bill_entry/ - Freight bill data entry modules
  • payments/ - Payment processing and managed returns
  • reporting/ - Carrier and imaging reports
rating_tariffs/
Rate calculation and tariff management
  • rate_calculation/ - Core rating algorithms
  • external_services/ - Rate service integrations
  • tariff_management/ - Tariff data management
carrier_integration/
External carrier system connectivity
  • tracking/ - UPS/FedEx tracking integration
  • mileage/ - PC Miler distance calculations
  • transit/ - Carrier Connect transit times
client_maintenance/
Customer data management and administration
  • master_data/ - Core client information
  • utilities/ - Email and reporting utilities
edi_data_exchange/
Electronic data interchange processing
  • transactions/ - EDI transaction processing
  • history/ - Transaction history and rejects

Operational Metrics

Processing Capabilities:
  • Transaction Volume: 1000+ EDI transactions processed daily
  • Integration Points: 25+ external systems connected
  • Business Functions: 50+ documented business processes
  • Technology Subjects: 27 technology implementation areas
System Characteristics:

Data Processing:

  • Automated error logging and monitoring

  • Soundex search capabilities for data lookup

Cross-Cutting Concerns

Security & Access Control:
  • Authentication: Role-based access control system
  • Access Control: User permission management and validation
  • Audit Tracking: Comprehensive change and access logging
Performance & Monitoring:
  • Execution Tracking: Performance monitoring and optimization
  • Benchmarking: System performance measurement
  • Error Monitoring: Automated error detection and logging
Data Management:
  • Data Validation: Input validation and business rule enforcement
  • Historical Auditing: Complete transaction audit trails
  • Automated Migration: Data migration and synchronization tools
System Configuration:
  • Character Code Management: System encoding configuration
  • Debug Configuration: Development and troubleshooting tools
  • Environment Management: Multi-environment deployment support

Modernization Opportunity

Current Challenges:
Legacy Platform Dependencies
MultiValue database platform limits modern development practices
Terminal-based Interface
Limited accessibility and mobile workforce support
Developer Talent Constraints
Specialized MultiValue skills limit development team options
Monolithic Architecture
Constraints on independent scaling and deployment
Modernization Benefits:
Cloud-Native Architecture
Scalability, reliability, and modern DevOps practices
Modern Web Interfaces
Improved user experience and mobile accessibility
Microservices Design
Independent scaling and faster feature development
Enhanced Integration
Modern API standards and improved partner connectivity
